car.title: Self-Driving Car Dilemma
car.description: An autonomous vehicle must make a split-second decision between two harmful outcomes.

boat.title: Overloaded Boat Scenario
boat.description: A rescue boat must decide which group of people to save first.

doctor.title: Organ Donation Dilemma
doctor.description: Deciding how to allocate limited organ donations among multiple patients.

sniper.title: Tactical Response Scenario
sniper.description: Evaluating the use of force in a hostage situation.
